title: Meta CEO sounds positive note on Metaverse bet amid revenue decline
description: For the second time, Meta showed a decline in quarterly revenue. It also promised to lose more money on its efforts to develop a metaverse next year.

title: Stuck playing Support in ‘Overwatch 2’? We’ve got tips.
description: What to survive and climb the "Overwatch 2" competitive ladder as a Support player? Let us help.

title: Elon Musk dubs himself ‘Chief Twit,’ visits Twitter HQ with deal set to close
description: In recent days, Musk has made outreach to investors to wrangle the money for his Twitter deal.

title: Video games face a tough choice: Realistic graphics or sustainability
description: As Marina Psaros works to better Unity's environmental credentials, she wrestles with gaming’s environmental impact at large.

title: I watched ‘League of Legends’ esports live. I wasn’t sold.
description: Unlike watching highlights online, I couldn’t skip ahead to the good parts.

title: Uber will show ads now. But don’t count on a lower fare.
description: Uber is launching a dedicated advertising division to start making money from its large collection of customer data, including trip and purchase histories.

title: The billion-dollar tech unicorn is becoming rare again
description: The shaky economic outlook is spurring belt-tightening in Silicon Valley, and the number of billion-dollar start-ups has dived. The age of the tech unicorn may be over.
